column4: Hi, I'm trying to move 4 folders to the trash, but when I try it says "Cannot move ___ to trash because you do not have permissions to change it or its parent folder". Do I have to get rid of it throug terminal?
yes.  you probably need to do 'sudo rm filename'
if you don't know much about the terminal, bzaks' method is better
hit the Up arrow in the toolbar, then go to home, then your username
